name: Enthusiastic Guidebook
landing_text: $(bold)Welcome, weary traveler.$() I have recorded in this book knowledge that will help you on your journey.$(br)Once you are done with your initial readings, you may take advantage of a little magic I learned - this book may be placed in a $(thing)crafting table$() with a handful of $(item)soil$(). $(l:start/akashic)More information can be found on this page.$(/l)
subtitle: Written by Utak Aluna
